name: Cheerio Yachty - Classic pokerdice game rolling strategy & adventure free
name_original: Cheerio Yachty - Classic pokerdice game rolling strategy & adventure free
description:
**SCORE MULTIPLE YATZYs**

**YELL IT PROUD: "YAAAAATZY!"**

This is the perfect game for Yatzy lovers. Have fun mastering this classic poker/dice game with people across the globe. Tons of customizable features so you can play your favorite rules.

**PLAY MULTIPLAYER LIVE AGAINST OTHERS**

Test your skills in 13 rounds, with 3 rolls per hand. Winner scores by creating the best poker hand: 3 of a kind, 4 of a kind, straights, and so on…

*This version will recognise and compute scoring for small straights as well!* :-)

Includes multiple challenging scoring categories to maximize your score!
